display_title.display_title:
Uruguay - Montevideo Power
            Transmission and Distribution Project : environmental impact assessment

docna.cdata!:
Uruguay - Montevideo Power Transmission and
            Distribution Project : environmental impact assessment

repnme.cdata!:
Uruguay - Montevideo Power Transmission and
            Distribution Project : environmental impact assessment

projn:
UY-Uruguay Power Transmission &
            Distribution Project -- P008177

abstracts.cdata!:
In order for Uruguay to satisfy market
            demand, studies reveal the need for Uruguay to invest in a
            500K V energy transmission system. This is separate from
            system upgrades and/or changes in tension distribution. The
            objective of this Environmental Impact Study of the
            Transmission System's Expansion Plan Project 1994-2000
            is to ensure the accordant performance of the project's
            components, specifically natural and socioeconomic components.
